name: Coolify
description: Coolify is an open-source, self-hostable PaaS (Platform as a Service) that lets you deploy any application, database, or service on your own infrastructure using a Heroku/Netlify-like experience. Supports Docker, Docker Compose, and Nixpacks. Deployed as a VM because it manages Docker at the kernel level.

default_credentials.note: Account created via Coolify onboarding at http://<VM-IP>:8000 on first access

notes.text: Deployed as a QEMU/KVM VM (not LXC) because Coolify manages Docker and requires direct kernel access.
SSH public key is required at install time. Set SSH_KEY env var or have ~/.ssh/id_ed25519.pub present on the Proxmox host.
Cloud-init installs Coolify automatically on first boot. Allow 3-5 minutes before accessing the dashboard.
Coolify dashboard port 8000 is open by default. Restrict with UFW after initial setup if exposing publicly.
Override storage pool or bridge: STORAGE=zfs-pool BRIDGE=vmbr1 bash vm/coolify-vm.sh
